statements: SELECT * FROM patient_consent_forms;
SELECT patient_id, consent_date FROM patient_consent_forms ORDER BY consent_date DESC;
SELECT form_id, patient_id, consent_date FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE consent_given = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT form_id, patient_signature FROM patient_consent_forms ORDER BY form_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT form_id, consent_date FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE consent_given = true ORDER BY consent_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS forms_count FROM patient_consent_forms GROUP BY patient_id HAVING forms_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE consent_given = false AND consent_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(form_id) AS avg_form_id, MAX(patient_id) AS max_patient_id FROM patient_consent_forms;
SELECT * FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, consent_text FROM patient_consent_forms ORDER BY date_signed DESC;
SELECT doc_type, doc_content FROM documentation WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT consent_text FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE date_signed > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM documentation ORDER BY doc_id ASC, patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, consent_text FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE date_signed > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, consent_text, date_signed FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE patient_id = 3 ORDER BY date_signed DESC;
SELECT doc_type, doc_content FROM documentation WHERE patient_id = 2 AND doc_type = 'Medical Record';
SELECT patient_id, doc_type FROM documentation WHERE doc_content LIKE '%diagnosis%' ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_consent_forms;
SELECT form_name, consent_date FROM patient_consent_forms ORDER BY consent_date DESC;
SELECT form_name, consent_date, signed FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE signed = TRUE;
SELECT record_id, patient_id, record_type FROM documentation_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT rule_name, description FROM regulations_compliance ORDER BY rule_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE signed = TRUE ORDER BY consent_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, form_name FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_records, record_type FROM documentation_records GROUP BY record_type;
SELECT rule_name, description FROM regulations_compliance WHERE rule_name LIKE 'Data%';
SELECT patient_id, form_name, consent_date FROM patient_consent_forms JOIN documentation_records ON patient_consent_forms.patient_id = documentation_records.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients;
SELECT consent_id, consent_date, consent_given FROM ConsentForms;
SELECT document_name, document_type, uploaded_by, uploaded_date FROM Documentations;
SELECT regulation_name, description, regulation_date FROM Regulations;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT document_name, document_type, uploaded_date FROM Documentations WHERE document_type = 'Report' ORDER BY uploaded_date LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name FROM Patients JOIN ConsentForms ON Patients.patient_id = ConsentForms.patient_id WHERE ConsentForms.consent_given = true;
SELECT regulation_name, description FROM Regulations WHERE regulation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patient ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT doc_type, doc_content FROM Documentation WHERE doc_type = 'Medical Report';
SELECT patient_name, compliance_status FROM Patient JOIN Documentation ON Patient.patient_id = Documentation.doc_id WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT reg_name, reg_description FROM Regulations WHERE reg_name LIKE '%privacy%';
SELECT * FROM Patient ORDER BY patient_name ASC, date_of_birth DESC
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patient WHERE consent_given = TRUE
SELECT form_date, form_details FROM ConsentForm ORDER BY form_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT doc_type, doc_content FROM Documentation WHERE doc_type = 'medical'
SELECT reg_name, reg_description FROM Regulations
